channel.title: ! MIND Boggling!
channel.description:
Someone please tell me what i'm doing wrong in setting up this server. I don't know how to host, i've read almost all guides but my router just won't allow it.
I've added the port in computer. I've tried to set-up a virtual server. (I'll show picture) And i've pressed runserver.
(I can get get into my server but no one else can :confused:
I Have DI-524, Router. With Wireless Internet
[url=http://img3.freeimagehosting.net/image.php?7cb2abb627.jpg][img]http://img3.freeimagehosting.net/uploads/th.7cb2abb627.jpg[/img][/url]

item.title: ! MIND Boggling!
item.dc:creator: @ryan123 ryan123
item.description:
@ryan123 wrote:

Alright…I’ll try to answer your problem as best i can so you can answer my question…Turn your windows firewall off, it doesn’t even protect your computer…basiclly everything can get through it, bypass it, etc. I should know…If you have mcafee you cant forward your ports in that so just leave your firewall down…if anything gets in the virus scan will delete it…3rd…make sure your no-ip is running and click it down on your scroll bar thing next to the time…right click it, hit show and check it…if it is a rosey cheek little thing advertise it and it should be good and people should be able to get on it…and for the windows firewall turning off thing it doesnt matter if its off or on because its not even funny how many windows machines ive bypassed the firewall to get into…i dont even know why they have it, it only gets in your way when your trying to do stuff like this. hope everything i said helps and i hope you have the time to answer my question. =-]

Read full topic

IS your windows firewall on and you’ve added the port 43594 in exceptions ?
